topics.description: Meditations to help you stress less, and enjoy more of the good this holiday season.
topics.title: Holiday 2019

topics.description: Keep your meditation fresh and inspired with fresh new content and editor's picks.
topics.title: New & Noteworthy

topics.description: Worried the 2020 election season will push you into boiling over or burning out? These meditations will guide you through staying as steady, sane, & engaged as possible.
topics.title: Election Sanity (2020)

topics.description: New to meditation? This collection is a great place to start.
topics.title: Great for Beginners

topics.description: Take a few minutes out of the day to build up your inner reserves and regain your balance.
topics.title: Stress

topics.description: Unpredictability is running high this holiday season. Stress less and enjoy more of the good amidst the chaos.
topics.title: Holiday

topics.description: Conquer the wrong side of the bed. Rise and shine with these meditations to kick off the day.
topics.title: Waking Up

topics.description: Happiness is a skill you can build. Get your ten percent boost with these practices.
topics.title: Happiness

topics.description: In times like these, we need practical, actionable ways of coping with stress, fear, and anxiety. The meditations here will help you build resilience and find some calm amidst the chaos. Stay tuned for regular updates.
topics.title: Coronavirus Sanity

topics.description: Racism can't be ignored. While meditation provides deep comfort, it also challenges us to see the world clearly. These meditations encourage you to contemplate identity, meet intense emotions, deeply resource yourself, and radically shift patterns of pain and bias.
topics.description_short: Attending to the fires of racism
topics.title: Relating to Race

topics.description: Less talk, more meditation. Return to these practices over and over, honing a specific technique or simply enjoying a little more breathing room. Each option trains a core skill to improve your confidence and help you develop a steady meditation habit.
topics.title: Lightly Guided

topics.description: Get engaged and stay balanced on U.S. mid-term election day.
topics.title: Election Day (2018)

topics.description: Get to sleep quickly with these guided meditations (and train your mind along the way).
topics.title: Sleep

topics.description: When the tough stuff comes up (and it will), these meditations will teach you how to respond wisely.
topics.title: Difficult Emotions

topics.description: Don't let distractions derail your day. Learn how to harness your attention, so you can concentrate on the things that matter most.
topics.title: Focus

topics.description: Every activity—walking, cleaning, commuting—can be a practice. These meditations help you train your mind, no matter where you are.
topics.title: On The Go

topics.description: Relationships are the bedrock of human life. Do yourself (and everyone around you) a favor by learning how to better handle your mind.
topics.title: Relationships

topics.description: If it's possible to be ten percent happier, what's the limit? Dip your toes into the deep end with this collection.
topics.title: Advanced & Unguided

topics.description: Bring your body and mind into sync. These meditations focus on health and wellbeing.
topics.title: Health

topics.description: The hallmark of a good practice is that we don't take ourselves too seriously. So lighten up and enjoy these slightly goofy meditations.
topics.title: Mental Mischief

topics.description: Here are some of the memorable moments and insightful practices that inspired our New York Times bestselling books.
topics.title: From Our Books
